thread.section_title: SHOWER SEAL LTD Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.theshowerseal.co.uk
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: SHOWER SEAL LTD reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I was struggling to find replacement handles that would fit the distance between the pre-drilled holes in my shower door glass, so I emailed this company to ask for recommendations. They were very helpful and suggested the adjustable door handles. These arrived promptly, were easy to fit and look great! Problem solved! Thank you.
